oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Photograph of Mary Austin Pitt Winn holding a great-grandchild
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Mary Austin Pitt Winn was the widow of Pvt. Henry Pitt, Co. B, 7th Tenn. Cav., CSA. He served under Gen. Nathan Bedford Forrest and died of wounds received at the Battle of Brice's Crossroads in 1864. She later married William Hunley Winn. The description reads "Aunt Mary Winn with Sunie's Baby, Memphis Tenn."
